markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 99 1.1 **Price** 500 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** L **Activate**Interact --- An etching of some aquatic beast dragging a figure beneath the waves adorns the ivory of a _whelming scrimshaw_. When you Activate this item, you break it and choose one creature within 30 feet. The target must attempt a DC 30 Fortitude save; [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207) and [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168) creatures are immune. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The target becomes [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [unable to breathe](/Rules.aspx?ID=468) until this sickened condition ends.
**Failure** As success, but sickened 2.
**Critical Failure** As success, but sickened 3.
name: Whelming Scrimshaw

text: <title level="1" right="Item 13" pfs="Standard" > Whelming Scrimshaw Source Treasure Vault pg. 99 1.1 Price 500 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L Activate Two Actions Interact --- An etching of some aquatic beast dragging a figure beneath the waves adorns the ivory of a whelming scrimshaw . When you Activate this item, you break it and choose one creature within 30 feet. The target must attempt a DC 30 Fortitude save; amphibious and aquatic creatures are immune. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The target becomes sickened 1 and unable to breathe until this sickened condition ends. Failure As success, but sickened 2. Critical Failure As success, but sickened 3.
